sentences.en: "Yes," he muttered, his voice so muted I hardly heard his reply.
sentences.cn: 他小声说：“是。”声音低得我几乎听不到。

sentences.en: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.cn: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.en: As a novel, Nineteen Eighty-four hardly ranks with the greats.
sentences.cn: 作为一部小说，《一九八四》很难被列为杰作。

sentences.en: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.cn: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.en: hardly any had previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 几乎没人有前科。

sentences.en: Hardly anyone (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.cn: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.en: He appeared hardly capable of conducting a coherent conversation.
sentences.cn: 他好像连话都说不清楚。

sentences.en: He slammed the door and stormed off. I could hardly blame him.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声关上门，气呼呼地走了。也难怪他会这么做。

sentences.en: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.cn: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.en: I'm so numbed with shock that I can hardly think.
sentences.cn: 我惊呆了，几乎无法思考。

sentences.en: Middlesex cricketers Gatting and Emburey are hardly flavour of the month.
sentences.cn: 米德尔塞克斯郡板球选手盖廷和恩伯里很难说是当红人物。

sentences.en: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

sentences.en: My hand shook so much that I could hardly hold the microphone.
sentences.cn: 我的手抖得如此厉害，几乎都拿不住麦克风了。

sentences.en: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.cn: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.en: Patsy could hardly be heard above the baby's yowls.
sentences.cn: 在婴儿的号哭声中很难听清帕齐在说些什么。

sentences.en: She could hardly believe the question was directed towards her.
sentences.cn: 她很难相信这个问题是冲她来的。

sentences.en: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.cn: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

sentences.en: Small English orchards can hardly compete economically with larger French ones.
sentences.cn: 英国的小型果园很难在经济上和法国的大型果园竞争。

sentences.en: The 14lb feline is so fat she can hardly walk.
sentences.cn: 这只14磅的猫这么胖，几乎连路都走不动了。

sentences.en: The building work has hardly begun.
sentences.cn: 施工才刚刚开始。

sentences.en: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.cn: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.en: Their two faces were hardly more than eighteen inches apart.
sentences.cn: 他俩的脸相隔还不到18英寸。

sentences.en: There was hardly a spare inch of space to be found.
sentences.cn: 几乎找不到一丁点空余的地方。

sentences.en: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.cn: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.en: they sold hardly any books.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎连一本书都没有卖掉。

sentences.en: we hardly ever see them.
sentences.cn: 我们很少见到他们。

sentences.en: We have our native inborn talent, yet we hardly use it.
sentences.cn: 我们有天生的才能，但我们却几乎未曾使用过。

phrases.tran_cn: 几乎未来得及就…；刚一…就…

trans.tran_cn: 几乎不，几乎没有，很难，刚刚，并不
